message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $20,000. I believe it holds significant value that will benefit you greatly.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $12,000 for the product.
Bob, I understand your position, but $20,000 is a very fair initial offer considering the true value of this product. I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $17,000?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the reduction, I still believe the product is overvalued. My counteroffer remains at $12,000.
